name: Heli Rush
description:
Tired playing advanced, futuristic endless runner games? Want to fly a helicopter that too in retro style? Heli Rush is a retro pixel art style platform game. Experience the adventure by dodging obstacles. Look for those yellow diamonds and keep collecting barrels for fuel.

Enjoy the game and please don't break your phone in excitement. Remember, it's just a game.

Game Features

  • One Touch Control.
  • Lots of fun.
  • Stunning Retro Graphics
  • Just a tap makes your heli fly.

    • Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
